Material used.Description: Differentially expressed proteins in mitochondrial extracts from differentiated SH-SY5Y cells overexpressing WT or A53T R-syn were analyzed.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased levels of WT R-syn resulted in changes to the mitochondrial proteome, leading to a significant reduction in OXPHOS 1 activity.

Biological replicates.Description: Four replicates each of control, A53T and WT groups in the pH 4-7 range and 3 replicates from each of the same three groups in the pH 6-11 range.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate for Western blot analysis.

Basic positive control.Description: Control cells (host cells) were used as a positive control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA (p < 0.01) and independent t-tests (host vs WT, host vs A53T)
